name: Cream Cheese Puff Pastry
author: Princess17
summary: This is an amazing cream cheese puff pastry appetizer that will make everyone's mouth water.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease a baking sheet with cooking spray
Cut thawed puff pastry sheet in half
Cut each half into 6 small squares
Put a spoonful of cream cheese on one side of each square
Fold over diagonally to make a triangle
Brush edges with water and press to seal
Transfer pastries to the prepared baking sheet
Brush beaten egg over top of the pastries to add shine
Bake in the preheated oven until top is golden, about 20 minutes
